episodes.title: TV3 News - Ireland - James Moran speaks about clerical sexual abuse 22 March 2013
episodes.description:
TV3 interview with James Moran, of www.37yearwait.blogspot.com  broadcast 22nd March 2013, after the sentencing in Dublin of Patrick McCabe. McCabe was given an 18 month sentence for clerical sexual abuse in the 1970's. Moran had to wait 37 years for justice.

My blog: 
http://www.37yearwait.blogspot.com

My petition for the release of Chapter 20 of the Murphy Report:
https://www.change.org/en-GB/petitions/ireland-release-chapter-20-of-the-murphy-report
